title: Tournament Quality Weighting System: 5-Factor Composite Implementation
description: Jose Mourinho's 5-factor composite weight system for tournament quality assessment. Factors: Player Quality Index (PQI), Competitiveness Index (CI), Recency Decay, Conditions Similarity, Sample Size Confidence. Covers 426 tournaments across 9,357 matches. Plan document: reviews/founder/tournament_weighting_plan_021126_v1.md. Phased implementation: Phase 1 (Data Layer) -> Phase 2 (Weight Computation) -> Phase 3 (Integration) -> Phase 4 (Validation). Estimated effort: 8-12 days.

florentino_gate.reason: Founder approved. 5-factor tournament quality weighting system for Jose Mourinho's quant research. Critical for analytical credibility of tournament-level insights.
